description: Depending on the Linux distribution, [RotaJakiro](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1078) executes a set of commands to collect device information and sends the collected information to the C2 server.(Citation: RotaJakiro 2021 netlab360 analysis)

external_references.description: Alex Turing, Hui Wang. (2021, April 28). RotaJakiro: A long live secret backdoor with 0 VT detection. Retrieved June 14, 2023.
